free: #e It is said that this piece of pork is delicious.
#n (已吃過，介紹好吃)。*Andi maibabuandau hai manambuh kaunun. 另外說法1: an-dii=dau mai-babu=an hai ma-ansum kaun-un. 另外說法2: tupa tu maansum dau andii mai babuan
#e The thing in the bag touches like a stick.
#c 袋子裡的東西摸起來像棍子。

#n 族語譯中文：袋子裡的東西據說摸到的時候就像木棍子。Isia iahlub tu haimangsut mais paciduan hai maszang=dau lukis 也合乎文法. isia iahlub tu haimangsut hai mais paciduan hai maszang=dau mas lukis. maza isia iahlub haimangsut a mais paciduan hai maszang=dau mas lukis
#e This stone is too big and I do not believe that you can lift it up.
#c 這塊石頭太大了，我相信你舉不起來。
#n 族語譯中文：這塊石頭太大，你一定沒有辦法舉得來。nii tu mahtu sidaza指不能(夠)抬/不可以抬。andii batu’an hai sika-mangmang daingaz at nii tu mahtu sidazaun: 這塊石頭非常大，據說抬不起來 (沒抬過，聽說抬不起來)。nautu nii tu mahtu si-dazaun. (絕對不可能抬起來)
#e Did the teacher say do not speak nonsense?
#c 「不要亂說」這句話是老師說的嗎？
#n 族語譯中文：「不要亂說」這是老師說的嗎？ maza tupa=dau tu ka tu tu-utmang hai adu itu masnanava tu sintupa.
#e A legend says that the black bulbul brought Bunun people fire.
#c 傳說紅嘴鳥為人類帶來了火種。

#n 族語譯中文：有一個傳說說紅嘴鳥曾經為族人取火種。另外一個說法 1: tupa palihabasan tu maza haipis hai m<in>indangaz=dau mas bunun siza mas sapuz. 另外一個說法 2: tupa dau palihabasan tu maza haipis hai m<in>indangaz mas bunun siza mas sapuz.
#e I heard that he said that Bukun said his teacher is beautiful.
#c 我聽他說Bukun說他的老師很漂亮。
#n ta’az=ik=su tupa tu Bukun hai tupa tu ma-nauaz=dau isaicia masnanava我聽你說Bukun說他的老師很漂亮。mi<n>humisan 是巫師祝福病人的話；mihumisan 是一般人祝福的話。
